title: Non smoking, pet friendly home for rent
posting_body: ['- Available September 1st with standard 12 month lease.', '- $2150/month plus utilities', '- Quiet neighborhood', '- Blocks from River Road and Grand Ave/Summit Avenue.', '- Full bathroom on second floor.', '- Hardwood floors throughout the home.', 'Stairs and upstairs hallway are carpeted.', '- Built in 1921 with classic designs and original woodwork .', '- Lots of windows, sunny and bright.', '- All bedrooms are upstairs and two have ceiling fans.', '- Closets in every bedroom plus linen and storage closets in the hall.', '- Cozy kitchen with oak cabinets', '+ dishwasher', '+ gas stove', '+ refrigerator', '+ hall pantry storage', '- Dining room with built-in oak sideboard/mirror.', 'Crystal chandelier.', '- Living and Dining rooms both have piano windows.', '- Refurbished 1-car garage with an opener.', '+ two additional off street parking spots (Very nice in this restricted parking neighborhood!).', '- Large, dry and clean basement with washer and dryer in laundry area with large cement utility sink.', '- Basement is semi finished and has lots of storage and a large, heavy duty work bench.', '- Boiler/radiator heat throughout the home.', '-Window ac units for summer.', '- Yard fenced and available for dog/gardening/BBQ!', '- Two or Three season porch, depending on your cold tolerance.', '- Pets allowed provided they meet certain requirements ($200 non refundable deposit also required).', '- Occupants pay utilities (electric/gas/water/phone/internet) and mow lawn/shovel snow.', '- Alley access is plowed every snowfall via neighborhood organization.', '- Inspected and approved by the Fire Department housing division.', '- Application process via Turbo tenant dot com', '- Tours by appointment only.']
